DOC.brief_summary: To assess effectiveness Bulkamid® injection female suffer stress mixed ( stress urge ) urinary incontinence 12 month follow period
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Safety Bulkamid® Bulking Agent Treatment Female Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Symptomatic stress mixed urinary incontinence least 12 month Having least 1 incontinence episode per day three day Regular intermittent user urethral catheter Pregnant woman Suffer severe allergy anaphylaxis Suffer autoimmune disease unstable sever cardiovascular disease History cancer within last 5 year Previous surgery treatment urinary incontinence , include bulking
